sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TDMR_DDC_AMT , PBT_DDC_AMT , DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT , CRDC_DDC_AMT , TOTA_SNW_AMT , MINM_USE_AMT , DDC_EXCL_AMT , ADD_DDCRT_DDC_AMT , DDC_PSB_AMT , DDC_LMT_AMT , GNRL_DDC_AMT , TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT , PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT , LST_DDC_AMT , FTYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT , PYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT1 , FTYR_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , TY_YR_TFHY_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE166010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TDMR_DDC_AMT , PBT_DDC_AMT , DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT , CRDC_DDC_AMT , TOTA_SNW_AMT , MINM_USE_AMT , DDC_EXCL_AMT , ADD_DDCRT_DDC_AMT , DDC_PSB_AMT , DDC_LMT_AMT , GNRL_DDC_AMT , TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT , PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT , LST_DDC_AMT , FTYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT , PYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT1 , FTYR_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , TY_YR_TFHY_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE166010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE166010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
